description: Searches the internet using multiple providers with intelligent fallback strategy
explanation: This plugin takes a search term and returns a JSON array of search results using a prioritized fallback strategy: LangSearch (primary), Google Custom Search, DuckDuckGo, SearXNG, and Brain/LLM as final fallback. Python version with enhanced functionality and maintainability.

inputDefinitions.name: searchTerm
inputDefinitions.description: The term to search for using intelligent provider fallback

outputDefinitions.name: results
outputDefinitions.description: Array of search results, each containing a title and URL

inputGuidance: IMPORTANT: Use 'searchTerm' for search queries, NOT 'keywords', 'query', or 'terms'
